Description of incident: Toyota Financial Services has contacted customers regarding a data breach when an unencrypted email that contained customer information was send to a third party vendor that worked on computer system enhancements for Toyota Financial Services. The information exposed included Toyota Financial System account numbers, bank account numbers and bank routing numbers. The company is offering one year of credit monitoring for free through ConsumerInfo.com, Inc through Experian. For questions call 1-877-371-7902.More information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-59287
